articles.author: Michael Ahr
articles.title: Daniel Henney Addresses The Wheel of Time's 'Internal Issues' - Den of Geek
articles.description: The Wheel of Time had a tumultuous production in its first season, but actor Daniel Henney’s character is about to enter his own period of unrest.
articles.content: Although the relationship between an Aes Sedai and her Warder is not necessarily romantic, Henney likens it to a type of marriage. Theyre like a married couple; theyve been on this journey for many, … [+2134 chars]
